config.value: SELECT now() as time, avg(loadingtime) as "loading_time", text(mapid) metric FROM performance_maploading GROUP BY mapid ORDER BY "loading_time" DESC LIMIT 20
SELECT now() as time, count(logic_unit_death_id) as "unitdeath", text(session_id) as metric FROM logic_unit_death GROUP BY session_id ORDER BY session_id ASC LIMIT 20
SELECT now() as time, count(resources_food) as "food", text(session_id) as metric FROM logic_resources_harvested GROUP BY session_id LIMIT 20
SELECT count(logic_hero_item_looted_id) as "loot", session_id FROM logic_hero_item_looted GROUP BY session_id LIMIT 20
